name: Slimeonauts
description:
Slimenauts is a isometric coop puzzel game created in UE4 for our university project.
You play as two astronaut brothers, Simeon and Levi, who have crashed landed on some floating slime islands. You must uterlise these slimes to get back to your rockets to get back home!

This game requires at least one controller to play. There is an option to have both players on controllers instead of one on mouse and keyboard like normal.

Credits:
Samuel Bate: Blueprints, Sound, Level Design, UX/UI, Enviroment Art and Implementation.
Tom Hodgins: 3D Assets and Concept Art.
Rafael Hossain: UX/UI and Lighting.
Elliot CB: Level Design, UI, Sound and Enviroment Art.
Michael Hill: 3D Assets.

Music:
https://uppbeat.io/track/zimpzon/calm
https://uppbeat.io/track/zimpzon/crystal
